title: [GAMEPLAY] Cant change ward skin
body:
i just bought the dark star ward skin and come to find out i cant change my ward skin because the box to change ward skins while in champ select is just a blank spot.

[Addition: ~~Riot knows of this problem and is working on a fix for it~~]

[Addition: THE PROBLEM HAS BEEN FIXED FOR ME AND A FRIEND OF MINE!!!!!!]

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=t1kVg0Oe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-15T18:33:21.114+0000)
>
> Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue and are working on a fix! Sorry about that. D:

replies.body: Thanks for the report! We're aware of this particular issue and are working on a fix! Sorry about that. D:

thanks for the info, there was another thread about this issue that i posted on and there were no Riot people leaving a comment back and then i saw that it was 4 months old and started a new one hoping for someone to see it
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

the problem has been fixed for me and my friend, thanks for the responses!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-hearts}}
i cant change it too since few days
